column3: School of Nursing, Midwifery and Paramedic Practice
column5: The MSc Advancing Practice course will equip you with contemporary knowledge to take forward the rapidly changing healthcare agenda, and make a positive difference. If you are an experienced registered nurse, midwife or health professional looking to develop a higher level of knowledge and skills required for specialist and advanced practice, then this course is for you.The five routes within this programme prepare for a range of people and situations to deliver safe, effective and person-centred care at a higher level of practice.The five routes are: Clinical Practice, District Nursing, Health Visiting, Nursing (only route available to international students) and School Nursing.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
column9: 18 months full time, 3 years part time
